text: @realDonaldTrump @ericgarcetti Because of botched efforts by the administration, Coronavirus numbers in the US are being grossly underreported. South Korea is testing more than 10,000 people every day. The US has not even tested 500 people overall. The numbers will get much worse. https://t.co/G8MooPu77b
